selectedVerses.text: I hate and abhor falsehood, but I love your law.
I will make my dwelling among you, and my soul shall not abhor you.
And you shall not bring an abominable thing into your house and become devoted to destruction like it. You shall utterly detest and abhor it, for it is devoted to destruction.
They abhor me; they keep aloof from me; they do not hesitate to spit at the sight of me.

Yet for all that, when they are in the land of their enemies, I will not spurn them, neither will I abhor them so as to destroy them utterly and break my covenant with them, for I am the LORD their God.
